PF-04449913 administer orally single agent patient select advanced hematologic malignancy , combination LDAC [ Low-Dose Ara-C ] cytarabine daunorubicin previously untreated patient AML [ Acute Myeloid Leukemia ] high-risk MDS [ Myelodysplastic Syndrome ] .
